import { Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';

import getTitle, { ComponentsList } from './stories';

<Meta title={getTitle('Overview')} />

## Carbon for Cloud & Cognitive

To support the transition to components and patterns from Carbon for Cloud & Cognitive, all [released components](https://ibm-cloud-cognitive.netlify.app/?path=/story/cloud-cognitive-released) are included with any installation of Carbon for IBM Security:

<ComponentsList />

You can use them by doing the following in your project:

```js
import { CloudCognitive } from '@carbon/ibm-security';

function App() {
  return <CloudCognitive.AboutModal />;
}
```
